column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=It first begins with turning on the heater in the bathroom for 10 minutes so that when I am waiting for the water to be warm I do not freeze .
#text=My parents and siblings think that this is weird but I do not care because it is my way of doing things .
#text=I look forward to a warm bath and enjoy getting clean and soaking afterwards to relax .
#text=Once the bath is full I slowly get in and feel the warmth wrap around my body .
#text=After getting comfy I close my eyes and relax for 10 or 15 minutes before beginning to get clean and proceed to get out .
#text=After cleaning I do not like to relax any longer because you are basically sitting in your dirt , grime , and filth .
#text=This is quite disgusting to think about and I would not ever recommend anyone to rest or relax in the filth .
#text=No matter how warm or cozy the water still seems .
